de.wota.gamemaster

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wota.gamemaster.Simulation

  • public class Simulation
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the main loop that calls tick() and updates both the view and the statistics. Also handels keyboard.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Simulation

        public Simulation(SimulationInstance inst,
          boolean isGraphical)
        Creates a runnable simulation from a SimulationInstance with the option for visualization.
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to be simulated
        isGraphical - true, if the simulation should be graphical

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        private void tick()
        Advance the game world by one tick and check for victory.

      • runSimulation

        public void runSimulation()
        Start the simulation and keep the view up to date. 1. Update the Graphics at the rate FRAMES_PER_SECOND 2. Update the Simulation with rate TICKS_PER_SECOND do nothing in the remaining time or if times get in conflict only update the graphics. keyboard/mouse input should be fetched before graphics in every loop.

      • createKeyboard

        private static void createKeyboard()
